suorittaneen-osaaminen: Vocational skills and competences required for completion of the qualification
tyotehtavat-joissa-voi-toimia: Range of occupations accessible to the holder of the certificate
tutkintotodistuksen-antaja: Name and status of the body awarding the certificate
tutkinnosta-paattava-viranomainen: Name and status of the national/regional authority providing accreditation/recognition of the certificate
tutkinnon-taso: Level of the certificate (national or international)
jatkoopinto-kelpoisuus: Access to the next level of education/training
tutkintotodistuksen-saaminen: Officially recognised ways of obtaining the certificate
